definition: Anna Sergeevna Kournikova (1981-), Russian tennis star and glamor model
Buddhist nun/(often used in phonetic spellings)
branch of study/administrative section/division/field/branch/stage directions/family (taxonomy)/rules/laws/to mete out (punishment)/to levy (taxes etc)/to fine sb/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: Hingis stayed steady throughout, never letting Kournikova break away.
sentences.chinese: 辛吉斯始終穩紮穩打，沒有給庫爾尼科娃以可乘之機。

sentences.english: Kournikova acknowledged the support she gets.
sentences.chinese: 庫爾尼科娃感謝觀衆對她的支持。

sentences.english: At present Kournikova is more successful on the net than at the net.
sentences.chinese: 現在，庫爾尼科娃在網上比在網前更成功。

sentences.english: She was single but it seems no longer. This man has become the envy of Kournikova admirers.
sentences.chinese: 而費多拉夫則成了庫爾尼科娃衆多崇拜者的衆矢之的。
